offre.title: Our Packages
offre.box1_text: At Summity, we believe in transparent pricing. Every project is unique, but to give you a clear idea of the investment, our training video projects start from <1>CAD $700</1> per minute produced.
offre.box2_text: The majority of our partners, Quebec SMEs, invest between <1>$3,500 and $8,000</1> for a complete series of training capsules that meets all their onboarding or continuous training needs.
offre.package1_desc: Ideal for a single capsule, an important internal communication, or to test the impact of video on your teams.
offre.package2_desc: Our most popular option. Perfect for creating a complete training series on new software, a sales process, or welcoming new employees.
offre.package3_desc: The partner solution for companies with recurring needs. Buy a bank of minutes and benefit from our best rate throughout the year.

processus.title: Our Creation Process
processus.subtitle: Discover how we transform your training processes into clear, engaging motion design videos designed to maximize retention.
processus.card1_desc: Launch call with Arthur. We define your needs together.
processus.card2_desc: Creation of the storyboard and script by our pedagogue and our scriptwriter.
processus.card3_desc: You validate the script and storyboard using our dedicated platform.
processus.card4_desc: Animation of the storyboard by our motion designers.
processus.card5_desc: You review the V1 of the video and give us your feedback on the platform.
processus.card6_desc: Corrections based on your feedback on V1 by our motion designers.

sections.title: Privacy Policy of Summity Inc.

sections.content: We collect information when you contact us via a contact form, subscribe to our newsletter, or use our website. The information collected may include your name, email address, phone number, and technical data (IP address, browser type) via cookies and web analysis tools like Google Analytics.

sections.title: 2. Use of Personal Information
sections.content:
The information we collect is used to:
  • Respond to your requests and questions.
  • Manage communications and send you information about our services.
  • Improve and personalize your experience on our website.
  • Analyze website usage to optimize our services.

Your information may be shared with third-party service providers (e.g., hosting services or newsletter platforms) to help us operate our business, but only if these third parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of this information.
